_sText:
**Hunger Games**
==================

Hunger games is a new mod that we are developing and will hopefully be successful in the future, this is how it looks so far, we have many plans to come up with, this is only a alpha version so please report bugs or any kind of problems you find

**Planned Future**
====================

Hopefully we will make random spawned weapons in the boxes.

Maybe 24 slots, but that depends on if it gets successful.

Arena is planned too.

Hovering trees will be fixed.

Making the map larger.

**Known bugs**
================

Radar is still on.

Ct, and T spawns, we only need one team.

The last one has to kill him self before the round restarts.



>> The Video. [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6oAar--xUCk](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6oAar--xUCk "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6oAar--xUCk")
